remarks: Define the class of all complete uniform spaces.  Definition 3 of [BourbakiTop1] p.  II.15.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Dec-2017.)
statement:
df-cusp $p |- CUnifSp = { w e. UnifSp | A. c e. ( Fil ` ( Base ` w ) ) ( c e. ( CauFilU ` ( UnifSt ` w ) ) -> ( ( TopOpen ` w ) fLim c ) =/= (/) ) } $.
$d c w $.
